metadata.title: CVE-2021-41092 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Docker CLI is the command line interface for the docker container runtime.A bug was found in the Docker CLI where running `docker loginmy-private-registry.example.com` with a misconfigured configuration file(typically `~/.docker/config.json`) listing a `credsStore` or `credHelpers`that could not be executed would result in any provided credentials beingsent to `registry-1.docker.io` rather than the intended private registry.This bug has been fixed in Docker CLI 20.10.9. Users should update to thisversion as soon as possible. For users unable to update ensure that anyconfigured credsStore or credHelpers entries in the configuration filereference an installed credential helper that is executable and on thePATH.

criterions.comment: docker.io package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
